The avatar is currently located at row 1, column 3. The goal is located at row 1, column 46. There are several obstacles (camels) in the maze, particularly in rows 3 and 4 at columns 1 and 2. Since the immediate area to the right (row 1, column 4 to row 1, column 45) is clear of obstacles, I can move in that direction.

To proceed toward the goal, I will move right from my current position.

``` Action:2 ```
This action is intended to navigate towards the goal (the green door) while avoiding the camels. I expect to see my avatar move from column 3 to column 4 without any issues.
